name: ThePASReport
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Over the past several decades, ideology and emotion have increasingly been injected into news media coverage, and today, journalism is dead morphing itself into activism and advocacy. The activist news media believes people must be told what to think. 

As a Professor, I challenge people to think critically about the issues and to foster an intellectual curiosity that drives them to seek more information and keep an open mind.

The P.A.S. Report differentiates itself by bringing a fresh educational perspective to the national conversation. Providing analysis on current issues, while keeping the intent of the founding fathers in mind, I encourage listeners to acquire an understanding of the real purpose of American government. My mission focuses on providing an in-depth examination of political issues impacting everyday Americans, and to bring back a love for the concepts of liberty and freedom. More importantly, The P.A.S. Report, attracts a broad audience, encouraging listeners to come to their own conclusion. Visit https://pasreport.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
